title: Document a Client Interaction
description: A social worker needs to log a phone call with a client in the case management system.

tasks.expected_outcome: The worker locates the correct file.
The worker initiates the correct process in the system.

tasks.description: Enter the details of the phone call, including the topics discussed and any follow-up actions, and save the note.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker successfully documents the interaction in the case file.
